name: He's behind you
description:
He's behind you is a horror adventure game where you play as a boy who wakes up in his school and realizes that everything around him has changed. 

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • E - pickup item / drop item / interact / activate 
  • Arrows - move picked up item around yourself
  • Space - next text line

Used assets:
